entry.title: Thursday night: Increasing cloudiness. Low minus 28.
entry.summary: Clear. Increasing cloudiness before morning. Wind up to 15 km/h. Low minus 28. Wind chill minus 22 this evening and minus 33 overnight. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023

entry.title: Friday: Chance of flurries. High minus 12. POP 70%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 70 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind up to 15 km/h. High minus 12. Wind chill minus 32 in the morning and minus 15 in the afternoon. Risk of frostbite. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 4:00 PM MST Thursday 23 February 2023
